name: Gardeners againts Mealybugs
description:
You wake up one morning and mealybugs along with red spiders have taken over the world. Take your pruning shears and team up with the gardeners to fight the pests and free Garden World.

I developed this prototype in one month and half, using Construct 2 as engine. I also have done the sprites and animations for the game, most of  them in the sprite tool of Construct. 

Controls:

WASD to move

E to pick/open

Z to speak

Left click to attack when you have a weapon equipped 

Mouse wheel to change between weapons when you have more than one
